tldr_by_pl.Developer Experience 2026: Major integration effort deploys Saarthi across 10 core repositories including data-jobs, developer UI, reporting services, and gateway components; production OpenWebUI instance integration and automated schema recreation scripts from DCR enhance developer workflow automation.
tldr_by_pl.DSP Core PL3: Development implements feature flagging infrastructure with anonymous LaunchDarkly client integration; Cortex Agent entry point functionality deployed behind feature flags for controlled rollout.
tldr_by_pl.DSP Core PL1: Order management enhancements include multi-select status filtering, persistent filter states, and improved selection handling; forecasting capabilities expand with channel, device, and inventory filters based on deal/exchange validation; critical security vulnerability addressed alongside pixel audience data integration in DCR Clickhouse.
tldr_by_pl.DSP Core PL5: implements updated Peer39 2026 rates across migration rules and rate structures; system now prevents activation of orders with seats separated from Boostr IO integration.
tldr_by_pl.Audiences PL2: Infrastructure improvements establish new IAM security roles for automated matching services to enhance system reliability and access control.

body_by_pl.Developer Experience 2026:
Saarthi Code Reviewer Integration Across Major Repositories

Value Add:
• Development teams now have automated code review capabilities integrated across all critical repositories including data-jobs, developer-ui, media-reporting, and gateway services.
• Code quality and consistency improvements are standardized across the entire platform with production-ready OpenWebUI model integration.
• Developer productivity increases through intelligent code suggestions and automated review feedback across ten key service repositories.

General Availability

Value Add:
• Developers can now quickly set up local Apache Spark environments with realistic test data through automated helper scripts.
• Local development cycles accelerate with seamless table schema recreation capabilities fetched directly from DCR systems.

General Availability
